body_html:
Btw just a -pedantic thought: I've been using LLVM-style documentation comments (in the C++ API, autograd, ATen etc.):

/// Doc

instead of JavaDoc style

/**
 * Doc
 */

because it doesn't require the extra line at the top and looks more natural. Should we maybe be uniform in this matter? I'd be strongly in favor of /// Doc

body:
Btw just a `-pedantic` thought: I've been using LLVM-style documentation comments (in the C++ API, autograd, ATen etc.):
```
/// Doc
```
instead of JavaDoc style
```
/**
 * Doc
 */
```
because it doesn't require the extra line at the top and looks more natural. Should we maybe be uniform in this matter? I'd be strongly in favor of `/// Doc`
